name: Examples And Demos
body:
### Welcome to Health NLP Examples and Demos
This is a hosting site for Health NLP / cTAKES components Examples and Demos



### Available Demos
1. [http://52.24.118.198:8080/index.jsp](http://52.24.118.198:8080/index.jsp)
This example outputs the entire CAS from the cTAKES pipeline using the Dictionary Lookup Fast Pipeline.

### Adding a new demo
1. Setup an EC2 instance for demo purposes
1. Ensure Java and Maven is installed
1. Git clone the project from the repo
1. mvn jetty:run
1. Launch browser to your instance:8080/index.jsp

### Editing this page
```
$ cd your_repo_root/repo_name
$ git fetch origin
$ git checkout gh-pages
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
